sqlMap.select:
select count(*) from bidcomp T where 1 = 1 and T.DELETE_FLG = '1'
T.BID_NO = #BID_NO#
T.BID_CO_SEQ = #BID_CO_SEQ#
T.BID_CO_NO = #BID_CO_NO#

select T.* from bidcomp T where 1 = 1 and T.DELETE_FLG = '1'
T.BID_NO = #BID_NO#
T.BID_CO_SEQ = #BID_CO_SEQ#
T.BID_CO_NO = #BID_CO_NO#
order by T.UPDATE_DATE desc LIMIT #start#, #end#
select T.* from bidcomp T where 1 = 1 and T.DELETE_FLG = '1' and T.BID_CO_NO in ($IDS$) order by T.BID_CO_SEQ asc

select T.* from bidcomp T where 1 = 1 and T.DELETE_FLG = '1'
T.BID_NO = #BID_NO#
T.BID_CO_SEQ = #BID_CO_SEQ#
T.BID_CO_NO = #BID_CO_NO#
order by T.UPDATE_DATE desc
select * from bidcomp where BID_CO_NO = #BID_CO_NO# and DELETE_FLG = '1'
sqlMap.insert:
insert into bidcomp(BID_NO,BID_CO_SEQ,BID_CO_NO,BID_CO_NAME,BID_CO_MANAGER,BID_CO_TEL,BID_CO_ADD,BID_CO_PS,TAX_NO,BID_PAYMENT_TYPE, BID_PRICE,BID_CHECK_PRICE,BID_RESULT,BID_WIN_PRICE,BID_APPLY_PRICE,BID_APPLY_PAYMENT_TYPE,BID_BOND,BID_VALUE_DATE,REFOUND_BOND_STATUS, REFOUND_DEPOSIT_DATE,BID_REFUND_SIGN,RECEPT_UL_FILE1,RECEPT_UL_FILE2,RECEPT_UL_FILE3,RECEPT_UL_FILE4,RECEPT_UL_FILE5, RECEPT_UL_FILE6,RECEPT_UL_FILE7,RECEPT_UL_FILE8,RECEPT_UL_FILE9,RECEPT_UL_FILE10, RECEPT_UL_FILE1_BASENAME,RECEPT_UL_FILE2_BASENAME,RECEPT_UL_FILE3_BASENAME,RECEPT_UL_FILE4_BASENAME,RECEPT_UL_FILE5_BASENAME, RECEPT_UL_FILE6_BASENAME,RECEPT_UL_FILE7_BASENAME,RECEPT_UL_FILE8_BASENAME,RECEPT_UL_FILE9_BASENAME,RECEPT_UL_FILE10_BASENAME, BID_APPLY_PRICE_DATE, INVOICE_TYPE,INVOICE_DATE,BID_RECEIPT_NO,BID_APPLY_PRICE_STATUS,MEMO1,DELETE_FLG,UPDATE_USER,INSERT_DATE, UPDATE_DATE,RESERVE1,RESERVE2,RESERVE3,RESERVE4,RESERVE5,RESERVE6,RESERVE7,RESERVE8,RESERVE9,RESERVE10, RESERVE_DATE1,RESERVE_DATE2) values(#BID_NO#,#BID_CO_SEQ#,#BID_CO_NO#,#BID_CO_NAME#,#BID_CO_MANAGER#,#BID_CO_TEL#,#BID_CO_ADD#,#BID_CO_PS#,#TAX_NO#,#BID_PAYMENT_TYPE#, #BID_PRICE#,#BID_CHECK_PRICE#,#BID_RESULT#,#BID_WIN_PRICE#,#BID_APPLY_PRICE#,#BID_APPLY_PAYMENT_TYPE#,#BID_BOND#,#BID_VALUE_DATE#,#REFOUND_BOND_STATUS#, #REFOUND_DEPOSIT_DATE#,#BID_REFUND_SIGN#,#RECEPT_UL_FILE1#,#RECEPT_UL_FILE2#,#RECEPT_UL_FILE3#,#RECEPT_UL_FILE4#,#RECEPT_UL_FILE5#, #RECEPT_UL_FILE6#,#RECEPT_UL_FILE7#,#RECEPT_UL_FILE8#,#RECEPT_UL_FILE9#,#RECEPT_UL_FILE10#, #RECEPT_UL_FILE1_BASENAME#,#RECEPT_UL_FILE2_BASENAME#,#RECEPT_UL_FILE3_BASENAME#,#RECEPT_UL_FILE4_BASENAME#,#RECEPT_UL_FILE5_BASENAME#, #RECEPT_UL_FILE6_BASENAME#,#RECEPT_UL_FILE7_BASENAME#,#RECEPT_UL_FILE8_BASENAME#,#RECEPT_UL_FILE9_BASENAME#,#RECEPT_UL_FILE10_BASENAME#, #BID_APPLY_PRICE_DATE#, #INVOICE_TYPE#,#INVOICE_DATE#,#BID_RECEIPT_NO#,#BID_APPLY_PRICE_STATUS#,#MEMO1#,#DELETE_FLG#,#UPDATE_USER#,NOW(), NOW(),#RESERVE1#,#RESERVE2#,#RESERVE3#,#RESERVE4#,#RESERVE5#,#RESERVE6#,#RESERVE7#,#RESERVE8#,#RESERVE9#,#RESERVE10#, #RESERVE_DATE1#,#RESERVE_DATE2#)
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS BID_CO_NO
sqlMap.update: update bidcomp set DELETE_FLG = #DELETE_FLG#, UPDATE_USER = #UPDATE_USER#, UPDATE_DATE = NOW() where BID_NO = #BID_NO#

update bidcomp set BID_NO = #BID_NO#, BID_CO_SEQ = #BID_CO_SEQ#, BID_CO_NAME = #BID_CO_NAME#, BID_CO_MANAGER = #BID_CO_MANAGER#, BID_CO_TEL = #BID_CO_TEL#, BID_CO_ADD = #BID_CO_ADD#, BID_CO_PS = #BID_CO_PS#, TAX_NO = #TAX_NO#, BID_PAYMENT_TYPE = #BID_PAYMENT_TYPE#, BID_PRICE = #BID_PRICE#, BID_CHECK_PRICE = #BID_CHECK_PRICE#, BID_RESULT = #BID_RESULT#, BID_WIN_PRICE = #BID_WIN_PRICE#, BID_APPLY_PRICE = #BID_APPLY_PRICE#, BID_APPLY_PAYMENT_TYPE = #BID_APPLY_PAYMENT_TYPE#, BID_BOND = #BID_BOND#, BID_VALUE_DATE = #BID_VALUE_DATE#, REFOUND_BOND_STATUS = #REFOUND_BOND_STATUS#, REFOUND_DEPOSIT_DATE = #REFOUND_DEPOSIT_DATE#, BID_REFUND_SIGN = #BID_REFUND_SIGN#, RECEPT_UL_FILE1 = #RECEPT_UL_FILE1#, RECEPT_UL_FILE2 = #RECEPT_UL_FILE2#, RECEPT_UL_FILE3 = #RECEPT_UL_FILE3#, RECEPT_UL_FILE4 = #RECEPT_UL_FILE4#, RECEPT_UL_FILE5 = #RECEPT_UL_FILE5#, RECEPT_UL_FILE6 = #RECEPT_UL_FILE6#, RECEPT_UL_FILE7 = #RECEPT_UL_FILE7#, RECEPT_UL_FILE8 = #RECEPT_UL_FILE8#, RECEPT_UL_FILE9 = #RECEPT_UL_FILE9#, RECEPT_UL_FILE10 = #RECEPT_UL_FILE10#, RECEPT_UL_FILE1_BASENAME = #RECEPT_UL_FILE1_BASENAME#, RECEPT_UL_FILE2_BASENAME = #RECEPT_UL_FILE2_BASENAME#, RECEPT_UL_FILE3_BASENAME = #RECEPT_UL_FILE3_BASENAME#, RECEPT_UL_FILE4_BASENAME = #RECEPT_UL_FILE4_BASENAME#, RECEPT_UL_FILE5_BASENAME = #RECEPT_UL_FILE5_BASENAME#, RECEPT_UL_FILE6_BASENAME = #RECEPT_UL_FILE6_BASENAME#, RECEPT_UL_FILE7_BASENAME = #RECEPT_UL_FILE7_BASENAME#, RECEPT_UL_FILE8_BASENAME = #RECEPT_UL_FILE8_BASENAME#, RECEPT_UL_FILE9_BASENAME = #RECEPT_UL_FILE9_BASENAME#, RECEPT_UL_FILE10_BASENAME = #RECEPT_UL_FILE10_BASENAME#, BID_APPLY_PRICE_DATE = #BID_APPLY_PRICE_DATE#, INVOICE_TYPE = #INVOICE_TYPE#, INVOICE_DATE = #INVOICE_DATE#, BID_RECEIPT_NO = #BID_RECEIPT_NO#, BID_APPLY_PRICE_STATUS = #BID_APPLY_PRICE_STATUS#, MEMO1 = #MEMO1#, DELETE_FLG = #DELETE_FLG#, UPDATE_USER = #UPDATE_USER#, UPDATE_DATE = NOW(), RESERVE1 = #RESERVE1#, RESERVE2 = #RESERVE2#, RESERVE3 = #RESERVE3#, RESERVE4 = #RESERVE4#, RESERVE5 = #RESERVE5#, RESERVE6 = #RESERVE6#, RESERVE7 = #RESERVE7#, RESERVE8 = #RESERVE8#, RESERVE9 = #RESERVE9#, RESERVE10 = #RESERVE10#, RESERVE_DATE1 = #RESERVE_DATE1#, RESERVE_DATE2 = #RESERVE_DATE2# where BID_CO_NO = #BID_CO_NO#
sqlMap.select:
select * from bidcomp where DELETE_FLG = '1'
BID_CO_NAME like '%$BID_CO_NAME$%'
LIMIT 0,30
